ingredients.ingredient: ½ ounce dark chocolate (such as Ghiradelli®), chopped

cookingTips: Freeze banana slices ahead of time for a quicker, creamier result
Blend until thick and creamy—it should resemble soft-serve ice cream
Serve immediately for best texture, or refreeze for scoopable consistency
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This three-ingredient frozen treat delivers satisfaction without excess calories. What makes it your go-to healthy dessert?
